title: 2 bedroom 2 bath Carlyle on The Lake
posting_body: Available for Rent Sept 1, 2022     Lovely, recently redecorated 2 bedroom 2 bath suite in much desired Carlyle on the Lake.
The Carlyle recently underwent a 5.5 million dollar renovation and is one of the most desired buildings on the lake front.
The available unit's recent upgrades include carpeting, window treatments, new paint, kitchen appliances and counter-tops, bathroom flooring and vanities.
The apartment is in pristine condition and offers fabulous sunset views over the wooded lakeside Lakewood area from your private balcony.
The large master bedroom has a large walk-in closet and en-suite bath.
One heated, underground garage space included and one storage locker.

24 hour reception/security, indoor/outdoor pools, beach access, sauna, jacuzzi, fitness center, billiards room with jukebox, two party rooms, conference room, guest suite, Summerhouse Restaurant, deli, hair and barber salon, real estate office, and more!
The Carlyle is considered to have the best amenities on the Gold Coast.
